A few Questions/Answers
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): A few Questions/Answers
By Elf* on Thursday, February 24, 2011 - 01:02 pm:

This is just a few things I've noticed, and the questions are mainly things I want to be sure of
before I embark upon my quest to max out a Mock.

-When a Monster's specific life stage is at ~.5, which way do I round? An example being a
Mock/Joker's first and second stages of life. Both are at 5%, so each stage would be 470/20 = 23.5
weeks each

-When at 0 Loyalty, does any Magic Banana effect that doesn't increase loyalty up my lifespan, or do
I need to still get the -10 effect, even if there's no discernible effect between -10, -5 or
nothing?

And moving on to a few answers for things, (Bear in mind I am on the PAL [EU] version)

- On three separate save files now (Two of which I lost due to a PS3 corruption -_-), I have been
visited by aliens before the second barn upgrade

- Hammed, the stronger S Class Hare in the FIMBA meet, is a Hare/Plant

- King Ape doesn't seem to be bugged in my game, I could easily find him again and post his stats up
here if you'd like

- I've seen numerous references that state the swim bug is fixed in the PAL version of the game.
This may be true for the Australian version, but certainly isn't on mine

- This was just a meandering thought I had one day. I know this site's very quiet compared to how it
used to be, and that there may well not be another tournament held, but to breach the PAL/American
barrier where we can't send save files, could we not simply give evidence of a monster and then you
could shark it? I'm not entirely sure on how the Gameshark works, so please correct me if I'm wrong,
like I say, it's just a thought.

That just about covers all of my more recent wonderings, anyway.

By mean2you on Monday, March 14, 2011 - 08:39 am:

http://legendcup.com/raisingmethodsmr2.php

Scroll down to "BANANA METHOD
EXTENDED RESEARCH" and monsterfrenrik posts his findings on the magic bananas.

I'm curious to what is the swim bug? I'm playing the PAL version so i assume it is fixed.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, March 14, 2011 - 09:47 am:

In the swim drill the Def stat gain amount is switched around with another number, so, you don't get what you're supposed to on that drill.

By Elf* on Tuesday, March 15, 2011 - 08:04 am:

Thanks for the information on the Bananas. That may actually motivate me to go ahead with this Mock idea.
And the Swim Bug is basically where the Defense/Life gains are switched around, so for example on a Plant,
instead of getting gains of around +8/+10/-3, you instead get something along the lines of +20/+4/-3.

By mean2you on Tuesday, March 15, 2011 - 11:14 am:

That seems like a pretty huge oversight.

So you are getting more LIF than DEF? even though the DEF is the main stat on the heavy drill.

By Elf* on Tuesday, March 15, 2011 - 11:34 am:

You get more for a species like Plant or Gaboo, but you also lose that gain for things like Monols, Nitons,
Durahans and Golems.
